chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Human Heart
chapters.info: Careme Mowly, p. 80—Young mother from Murandy. Her daughter is Sedrin's age, to the day. Her future husband ran off to become a Warder, and she does not like the man she actually did marry nearly as much. She wants very little to do with the White Tower. See also Mowly, Ellya.
